en: If, however, a State referred to in Article 1(1) has not deposited its instrument of ratification in due time, this Treaty shall enter into force for the other State which has deposited its instrument.

en: Bulgaria and Romania accede to the decisions and agreements adopted by the Representatives of the Governments of the Member States meeting within the Council.

en: The Council, acting unanimously on a proposal from the Commission, may adopt European decisions supplementing Annex I with those conventions, agreements and protocols signed before the date of accession.
es: El Consejo, por unanimidad y a propuesta de la Comisión, podrá adoptar decisiones europeas que completen el Anexo I con los convenios, acuerdos y protocolos firmados antes de la fecha de adhesión.

answers: ["Yes", "On a proposal from the Commission", "Conventions, agreements, and protocols signed before the date of accession", "Signed before the date of accession"]

en: The particular instruments mentioned in this Article include those referred to in Article IV‐438 of the Constitution.
es: Los instrumentos concretos a que se refiere el presente artículo incluyen los recogidos en el artículo IV-438 de la Constitución.
questions: ["Which instruments are mentioned in this Article?", "What specific instruments are referred to in Article IV-438 of the Constitution?"]
answers: ["Those referred to in Article IV-438 of the Constitution", "Those referred to in Article IV-438 of the Constitution"]

en: Bulgaria and Romania shall participate in Economic and Monetary Union from the date of accession as Member States with a derogation within the meaning of Article III-197 of the Constitution.
es: Bulgaria y Rumanía participarán en la Unión Económica y Monetaria a partir de la fecha de adhesión en calidad de Estados miembros acogidos a una excepción en el sentido del artículo III‐197 de la Constitución.

answers: ["From the date of accession as Member States", "As Member States", "Yes", "Article III-197 of the Constitution"]

en: Bulgaria and Romania undertake to accede, under the conditions laid down in this Protocol, to the agreements or conventions concluded or signed by the Union and the present Member States, acting jointly.
es: Bulgaria y Rumanía se comprometen a adherirse, en las condiciones establecidas en el presente Protocolo, a los acuerdos y convenios celebrados o firmados conjuntamente por la Unión y los actuales Estados miembros.
questions: ["What does Bulgaria undertake regarding accession to agreements or conventions?", "What does Romania undertake regarding accession to agreements or conventions?", "Under what conditions do Bulgaria and Romania undertake to accede to agreements or conventions?", "Which agreements or conventions are Bulgaria and Romania undertaking to accede to?", "What role does the Union play in the agreements or conventions that Bulgaria and Romania are undertaking to accede to?", "What role do the present Member States play in the agreements or conventions that Bulgaria and Romania are undertaking to accede to?"]
answers: ["To accede to the agreements or conventions concluded or signed by the Union and the present Member States, acting jointly", "To accede to the agreements or conventions concluded or signed by the Union and the present Member States, acting jointly", "Under the conditions laid down in this Protocol", "The agreements or conventions concluded or signed by the Union and the present Member States", "The Union plays the role of acting jointly in concluding or signing the agreements or conventions", "The present Member States play the role of acting jointly in concluding or signing the agreements or conventions"]

en: It shall submit a draft of the protocols for conclusion to the Council.
es: La Comisión presentará un proyecto de los protocolos para su celebración por el Consejo.
questions: ["To whom shall the draft of the protocols for conclusion be submitted?"]
answers: ["The Council"]

en: Upon acceding to the agreements and conventions referred to in paragraph 2 Bulgaria and Romania shall acquire the same rights and obligations under those agreements and conventions as the present Member States.
es: Una vez se hayan adherido a los acuerdos y convenios a que se refiere el apartado 2, Bulgaria y Rumanía tendrán los mismos derechos y obligaciones que establecen dichos acuerdos y convenios para los Estados miembros actuales.
questions: ["What rights and obligations will Bulgaria and Romania acquire upon acceding to the agreements and conventions referred to in paragraph 2?", "Will Bulgaria and Romania acquire the same rights and obligations as the present Member States upon acceding to the agreements and conventions referred to in paragraph 2?"]
answers: ["the same rights and obligations under those agreements and conventions as the present Member States", "Yes"]

en: This obligation also applies to those agreements or conventions which the Union and the present Member States have agreed to apply provisionally.
es: Esta obligación también es aplicable a los acuerdos y convenios que la Unión y los Estados miembros actuales han convenido en aplicar provisionalmente.
questions: ["Does this obligation apply to agreements or conventions agreed to by the Union and the present Member States for provisional application?"]
answers: ["Yes"]

en: Pending the entry into force of the protocols referred to in paragraph 2, the Union and the Member States, acting jointly as appropriate in the framework of their respective competences, shall take any appropriate measure.
es: Hasta que entren en vigor los protocolos a que se refiere el apartado 2, la Unión y los Estados miembros, pronunciándose conjuntamente cuando proceda en el marco de sus respectivas competencias, adoptarán todas las medidas oportunas.
questions: ["What measures will the Union and the Member States take pending the entry into force of the protocols referred to in paragraph 2?", "Under what conditions will the Union and the Member States act jointly to take measures?"]
answers: ["Any appropriate measure", "Acting jointly as appropriate in the framework of their respective competences"]

en: Bulgaria and Romania undertake to accede, under the conditions laid down in this Protocol, to the Agreement on the European Economic Area, in accordance with Article 128 of that Agreement.
es: Bulgaria y Rumanía se comprometen a adherirse, en las condiciones establecidas en el presente Protocolo, al Acuerdo sobre el Espacio Económico Europeo, con arreglo a lo dispuesto en el artículo 128 del mismo.
questions: ["What countries undertake to accede to the Agreement on the European Economic Area?", "Under what conditions do Bulgaria and Romania undertake to accede to the Agreement on the European Economic Area?", "Which article of the Agreement on the European Economic Area specifies the conditions for accession by Bulgaria and Romania?"]
answers: ["Bulgaria and Romania", "Under the conditions laid down in this Protocol", "Article 128"]

en: As from the date of accession, Bulgaria and Romania shall apply the bilateral textile agreements and arrangements concluded by the Union with third countries.
es: A partir de la fecha de adhesión, Bulgaria y Rumanía aplicarán los acuerdos y arreglos textiles bilaterales celebrados por la Unión con terceros países.
questions: ["From the date of accession, will Bulgaria apply the bilateral textile agreements with third countries?", "From the date of accession, will Romania apply the bilateral textile agreements with third countries?"]
answers: ["Yes", "Yes"]

en: The quantitative restrictions applied by the Union on imports of textile and clothing products shall be adjusted to take account of the accession of Bulgaria and Romania to the Union.
es: Se procederá a una adaptación de las restricciones cuantitativas aplicadas por la Unión a las importaciones de productos textiles y prendas de vestir con el fin de tener en cuenta la adhesión de Bulgaria y Rumanía a la Unión.
questions: ["How shall the quantitative restrictions applied by the Union on imports of textile and clothing products be adjusted following the accession of Bulgaria and Romania to the Union?"]
answers: ["To take account of the accession of Bulgaria and Romania to the Union"]

en: To that effect, amendments to the bilateral agreements and arrangements referred to above may be negotiated by the Union with the third countries concerned prior to the date of accession.
es: A tal efecto, la Unión podrá negociar con los terceros países interesados modificaciones de los citados acuerdos y arreglos bilaterales antes de la adhesión.
questions: ["Can amendments to the bilateral agreements and arrangements be negotiated by the Union with the third countries concerned prior to the date of accession?"]

questions: ["For how long after accession may pre-accession funds be committed for audit and evaluation costs?"]
answers: ["Five years"]

en: Unless stated otherwise in paragraphs 2 to 5, the provisions governing the implementation of measures approved pursuant to the latter Regulation shall apply to those measures.
es: Salvo disposición en contrario de los apartados 2 a 5, se aplicarán a dichas medidas las disposiciones por las que se rige la aplicación de las medidas aprobadas de conformidad con este último Reglamento.
questions: ["Unless stated otherwise in paragraphs 2 to 5, what provisions shall apply to measures approved pursuant to the latter Regulation?"]
answers: ["the provisions governing the implementation of measures approved pursuant to the latter Regulation"]

en: However, the provisions contained in Article 165 of the Financial Regulation applicable to the general budget of the European Communities shall not apply.
es: Sin embargo, no serán de aplicación las disposiciones previstas en el artículo 165 del Reglamento financiero aplicable al presupuesto general de las Comunidades Europeas.
questions: ["Which provisions in Article 165 of the Financial Regulation do not apply?", "What specific provisions applicable to the general budget of the European Communities are excluded?"]
answers: ["The provisions contained in Article 165 of the Financial Regulation", "The provisions applicable to the general budget of the European Communities"]

en: The assistance, or parts thereof, may be made available as a Community contribution to the Kozloduy International Decommissioning Support Fund, managed by the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development.
es: La ayuda podrá facilitarse, en parte o en su totalidad, en calidad de contribución comunitaria al Fondo Internacional de Apoyo al Desmantelamiento de Kozloduy, gestionado por el Banco Europeo de Reconstrucción y Desarrollo.
questions: ["Can the assistance, or parts thereof, be made available as a Community contribution to the Kozloduy International Decommissioning Support Fund?", "Who manages the Kozloduy International Decommissioning Support Fund?"]
answers: ["Yes", "The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development"]

en: The Commission may adopt rules for implementation of the assistance referred to in paragraph 2.
es: La Comisión podrá adoptar normas para la ejecución de la ayuda contemplada en el apartado 2.
questions: ["What rules may the Commission adopt regarding the assistance referred to in paragraph 2?"]
answers: ["Rules for implementation of the assistance referred to in paragraph 2"]

en: The rules shall be adopted in accordance with Council Decision 1999/468/EC of 28 June 1999 laying down the procedures for the exercise of implementing powers conferred on the Commission.
es: Las normas deberán adoptarse de conformidad con la Decisión 1999/468/CE del Consejo, de 28 de junio de 1999, por la que se establecen los procedimientos para el ejercicio de las competencias de ejecución atribuidas a la Comisión.
questions: ["What document lays down the procedures for the exercise of implementing powers conferred on the Commission?", "In accordance with which Council Decision shall the rules be adopted?"]
answers: ["Council Decision 1999/468/EC of 28 June 1999", "Council Decision 1999/468/EC of 28 June 1999"]

en: To this end, the Commission shall be assisted by a committee.
es: A tal fin, la Comisión estará asistida por un comité.
questions: ["What will assist the Commission to this end?"]
answers: ["A committee"]

en: This assistance shall fund institution‐building projects and limited small-scale investments ancillary thereto.
es: Esta ayuda se destinará a financiar proyectos de desarrollo institucional y determinadas inversiones conexas a pequeña escala.
questions: ["What types of projects will this assistance fund?", "What kind of small-scale investments will be funded by this assistance?"]
answers: ["institution‐building projects", "limited small-scale investments ancillary thereto"]

en: Assistance shall address the continued need for strengthening institutional capacity in certain areas through action which cannot be financed by the Structural Funds or by the Rural Development Funds.
es: Mediante esta ayuda se atenderá a la necesidad de seguir reforzando la capacidad institucional en determinados ámbitos a través de medidas que no pueden financiarse con los fondos con finalidad estructural o con los fondos de desarrollo rural.
questions: ["What areas require continued strengthening of institutional capacity?", "What type of actions cannot be financed by the Structural Funds or the Rural Development Funds?"]
answers: ["Certain areas", "Actions which cannot be financed by the Structural Funds or by the Rural Development Funds"]

en: The commitment appropriations for the Transition Facility, at 2004 prices, for Bulgaria and Romania, shall be EUR 82 million in the first year after accession to address national and horizontal priorities.
es: El importe de los créditos de compromiso para el mecanismo de transición, a precios de 2004, para Bulgaria y Rumanía será de 82 millones de euros durante el primer año después de la adhesión para abordar prioridades nacionales y horizontales.
questions: ["What are the commitment appropriations for the Transition Facility for Bulgaria and Romania at 2004 prices?", "For which national and horizontal priorities are the commitment appropriations for the Transition Facility allocated in the first year after accession?"]
answers: ["EUR 82 million", "National and horizontal priorities"]

en: The appropriations shall be authorised by the budgetary authority within the limits of the financial perspective.
es: Los créditos deberán ser autorizados por la autoridad presupuestaria dentro de los límites de las perspectivas financieras.
questions: ["Within what limits shall the appropriations be authorised by the budgetary authority?"]
answers: ["Within the limits of the financial perspective"]

en: Assistance under the Transition Facility shall be decided and implemented in accordance with Council Regulation (EEC) No 3906/89 on economic aid to certain countries of Central and Eastern Europe.
es: La ayuda en el marco del mecanismo de transición se decidirá y aplicará de conformidad con el Reglamento (CEE) n.o 3906/89 del Consejo relativo a la ayuda económica en favor de determinados países de Europa Central y Oriental.
questions: ["According to which regulation shall assistance under the Transition Facility be decided and implemented?", "What regulation governs the decision and implementation of assistance under the Transition Facility?"]
answers: ["Council Regulation (EEC) No 3906/89 on economic aid to certain countries of Central and Eastern Europe", "Council Regulation (EEC) No 3906/89 on economic aid to certain countries of Central and Eastern Europe"]

en: For the period 2007-2009, the following amounts (2004 prices) shall be made available to Bulgaria and Romania in the form of lump-sum payments under the temporary Cash-flow and Schengen Facility:
es: Para el periodo 2007-2009 se pondrán a disposición de Bulgaria y de Rumanía las siguientes cantidades (a precios de 2004) en concepto de pagos a tanto alzado con cargo al mecanismo de flujos de efectivo y de Schengen:
questions: ["What amounts (in 2004 prices) shall be made available to Bulgaria and Romania for the period 2007-2009?", "Under which facility shall the amounts be made available to Bulgaria and Romania?", "What is the form of the payments made to Bulgaria and Romania during 2007-2009?"]

en: One twelfth of each annual amount shall be payable to Bulgaria and Romania on the first working day of each month in the corresponding year.
es: El primer día laborable de cada mes del año correspondiente se abonará a Bulgaria y a Rumanía un doceavo de la cantidad anual.
questions: ["What portion of each annual amount shall be payable to Bulgaria and Romania?", "When shall the payment to Bulgaria and Romania be made each month?", "On which day of each month shall the payment to Bulgaria and Romania be made?"]
answers: ["One twelfth", "On the first working day of each month in the corresponding year", "On the first working day"]

en: The lump-sum payments shall be used within three years from the first payment.
es: Los pagos a tanto alzado deberán utilizarse en un plazo de tres años a partir del primer pago.
questions: ["Within how many years shall the lump-sum payments be used from the first payment?"]
answers: ["three"]

en: Any unused or unjustifiably spent funds shall be recovered by the Commission.
es: Todos los fondos no empleados o gastados de manera injustificada serán recuperados por la Comisión.
questions: ["What happens to any unused or unjustifiably spent funds?"]
answers: ["They shall be recovered by the Commission"]

en: The Commission may adopt any technical provisions necessary for the operation of the temporary Cash-flow and Schengen Facility.
es: La Comisión podrá adoptar cuantas disposiciones técnicas sean necesarias para el funcionamiento del mecanismo temporal de flujos de efectivo y de Schengen.
questions: ["What technical provisions may the Commission adopt for the operation of the temporary Cash-flow and Schengen Facility?"]
answers: ["Any technical provisions necessary for the operation of the temporary Cash-flow and Schengen Facility"]

en: Without prejudice to future policy decisions, the overall commitment appropriations for structural actions to be made available for Bulgaria and Romania over the three-year period 2007‐2009 shall be as follows:
es: Sin perjuicio de futuras decisiones políticas, el importe global de los créditos de compromiso para acciones estructurales que se pondrá a disposición de Bulgaria y Rumanía durante el trienio 2007-2009 será el que se indica a continuación:
questions: ["What are the overall commitment appropriations for structural actions to be made available for Bulgaria and Romania over the three-year period 2007–2009?", "Are there any future policy decisions that may affect the commitment appropriations for structural actions for Bulgaria and Romania?"]
answers: ["as follows", "No"]

en: During the three years 2007-2009, the scope and nature of the interventions within these fixed country envelopes shall be determined on the basis of the provisions then applicable to structural actions expenditure.
es: Durante el trienio 2007-2009, el alcance y la naturaleza de las intervenciones en el marco de estas dotaciones fijas por país se determinarán sobre la base de las disposiciones aplicables en ese momento a los gastos para acciones estructurales.
questions: ["On what basis shall the scope and nature of the interventions within these fixed country envelopes be determined during 2007-2009?", "What determines the scope and nature of the interventions within these fixed country envelopes during 2007-2009?"]
answers: ["On the basis of the provisions then applicable to structural actions expenditure", "The provisions then applicable to structural actions expenditure"]

en: Without prejudice to future policy decisions, commitment appropriations from the EAGGF Guarantee Section for rural development for Bulgaria and Romania over the three-year period 2007-2009 shall amount to EUR 3041 million (2004 prices).
es: Sin perjuicio de futuras decisiones políticas, los créditos de compromiso de la Sección Garantía del FEOGA para desarrollo rural en Bulgaria y Rumanía durante el trienio 2007-2009 ascenderán a 3041 millones de euros (precios de 2004).
questions: ["What is the amount of commitment appropriations from the EAGGF Guarantee Section for rural development for Bulgaria and Romania over the three-year period 2007-2009?", "What are the commitment appropriations from the EAGGF Guarantee Section for rural development for Bulgaria and Romania in EUR (2004 prices)?"]
answers: ["EUR 3041 million", "EUR 3041 million"]

en: Implementing rules, where necessary, for the application of the provisions of Annex VIII shall be adopted in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 50(2) of Regulation (EC) No 1260/1999.
es: Las normas de desarrollo de las disposiciones del Anexo VIII se adoptarán, en caso necesario, con arreglo al procedimiento establecido en el apartado 2 del artículo 50 del Reglamento (CE) n.o 1260/1999.
questions: ["What procedure shall be followed for adopting implementing rules for the application of the provisions of Annex VIII?", "Where are the implementing rules for the application of the provisions of Annex VIII to be adopted according to?"]
answers: ["In accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 50(2) of Regulation (EC) No 1260/1999", "Article 50(2) of Regulation (EC) No 1260/1999"]

en: The Council, acting on a proposal from the Commission, and after consulting the European Parliament, shall make any adaptations to the provisions of Annex VIII where necessary to ensure coherence with the regulations concerning rural development.
es: El Consejo, a propuesta de la Comisión y previa consulta al Parlamento Europeo, hará las adaptaciones necesarias de las disposiciones del Anexo VIII a fin de garantizar su coherencia con la reglamentación en materia de desarrollo rural.
questions: ["Who shall make any adaptations to the provisions of Annex VIII?", "On what basis shall adaptations be made to the provisions of Annex VIII?", "What condition must be met for adaptations to be made to the provisions of Annex VIII?", "Which body proposed the adaptations to the provisions of Annex VIII?", "Which body was consulted before adaptations to the provisions of Annex VIII were made?"]
answers: ["The Council", "On a proposal from the Commission", "To ensure coherence with the regulations concerning rural development", "The Commission", "The European Parliament"]

en: The amounts referred to in Articles 30, 31, 32, 33 and 34 shall be adjusted by the Commission each year in line with movements in prices as part of the annual technical adjustments to the financial perspective.
es: Las cantidades mencionadas en los artículos 30, 31, 32, 33 y 34 serán ajustadas cada año por la Comisión de conformidad con las variaciones de los precios como parte de los ajustes técnicos anuales de las perspectivas financieras.
questions: ["Which articles refer to amounts that are adjusted by the Commission each year?", "What is the basis for the annual adjustment of the amounts referred to in Articles 30, 31, 32, 33, and 34?", "How are the amounts in Articles 30, 31, 32, 33, and 34 adjusted each year?", "What part of the financial perspective involves the annual technical adjustments to the amounts in Articles 30, 31, 32, 33, and 34?"]
answers: ["Articles 30, 31, 32, 33 and 34", "Movements in prices", "By the Commission each year in line with movements in prices", "The annual technical adjustments"]

en: In the same circumstances, any present Member State may apply for authorisation to take protective measures with regard to Bulgaria, Romania, or both those States.
es: En las mismas circunstancias, cualquier Estado miembro actual podrá pedir autorización para adoptar medidas de salvaguardia respecto de Bulgaria, de Rumanía, o de ambos Estados.
questions: ["Can any present Member State apply for authorisation to take protective measures with regard to Bulgaria?", "Can any present Member State apply for authorisation to take protective measures with regard to Romania?", "Can any present Member State apply for authorisation to take protective measures with regard to both Bulgaria and Romania?"]
answers: ["Yes", "Yes", "Yes"]

en: In the event of serious economic difficulties and at the express request of the Member State concerned, the Commission shall act within five working days of the receipt of the request accompanied by the relevant background information.
es: En caso de dificultades económicas graves y a petición expresa del Estado miembro interesado, la Comisión se pronunciará en el plazo de cinco días laborables a partir de la recepción de la solicitud, acompañada de la información pertinente.
questions: ["In the event of serious economic difficulties and at the express request of the Member State concerned, how long does the Commission have to act after receiving the request?", "What information must accompany the request for the Commission to act?", "Under what conditions will the Commission act in response to a request from a Member State?"]
answers: ["Within five working days of the receipt of the request", "The relevant background information", "In the event of serious economic difficulties and at the express request of the Member State concerned"]

en: The measures thus decided on shall be applicable forthwith, shall take account of the interest of all parties concerned and shall not entail frontier controls.
es: Las medidas así decididas serán aplicables inmediatamente, tendrán en cuenta el interés de todas las partes y no implicarán controles fronterizos.
questions: ["When shall the measures thus decided on come into effect?", "What consideration shall the measures take into account?", "Will the measures entail frontier controls?"]
answers: ["forthwith", "the interest of all parties concerned", "No"]

en: Priority shall be given to such measures as will least disturb the functioning of the internal market.
es: Se dará prioridad a las medidas que menos perturben el funcionamiento del mercado interior.
questions: ["Which measures will be given priority if they least disturb the functioning of the internal market?"]
answers: ["Such measures as will least disturb the functioning of the internal market"]

en: Measures shall be proportional and priority shall be given to measures which least disturb the functioning of the internal market and, where appropriate, to the application of the existing sectoral safeguard mechanisms.
es: Estas medidas serán proporcionadas y se dará prioridad a aquéllas que menos perturben el funcionamiento del mercado interior y, cuando proceda, a la aplicación de los mecanismos de salvaguardia sectoriales existentes.
questions: ["What principle should guide the proportionality of the measures?", "Which type of measures should receive priority in relation to the functioning of the internal market?", "Should existing sectoral safeguard mechanisms be considered when determining priority for measures?"]
answers: ["Measures shall be proportional", "Measures which least disturb the functioning of the internal market", "Yes"]

en: Such safeguard measures shall not be invoked as a means of arbitrary discrimination or a disguised restriction on trade between Member States.
es: No se utilizarán estas medidas de salvaguardia como medio para introducir una discriminación arbitraria o una restricción encubierta en el comercio entre Estados miembros.
questions: ["Can safeguard measures be invoked as a means of arbitrary discrimination?", "Can safeguard measures be invoked as a disguised restriction on trade between Member States?"]

en: The safeguard clause may be invoked even before accession on the basis of the monitoring findings and the measures adopted shall enter into force as of the first day of accession unless they provide for a later date.
es: La cláusula de salvaguardia podrá ser invocada incluso antes de la adhesión sobre la base de las conclusiones de los controles y las medidas adoptadas entrarán en vigor desde el día de la adhesión a menos que en ellas se fije una fecha posterior.
questions: ["Can the safeguard clause be invoked before accession?", "On what basis may the safeguard clause be invoked before accession?", "When do the measures adopted enter into force if they do not specify a later date?", "When do the measures adopted enter into force as of the first day of accession?"]
answers: ["Yes", "On the basis of the monitoring findings", "As of the first day of accession", "As of the first day of accession"]

en: The measures shall be maintained no longer than strictly necessary and, in any case, shall be lifted when the relevant commitment is implemented.
es: Las medidas no se mantendrán más de lo estrictamente necesario y, en todo caso, se suspenderán cuando se dé cumplimiento al compromiso correspondiente.
questions: ["For how long shall the measures be maintained?", "When shall the measures be lifted?"]
answers: ["No longer than strictly necessary", "When the relevant commitment is implemented"]

en: They may however be applied beyond the period specified in the first paragraph as long as the relevant commitments have not been fulfilled.
es: Sin embargo, podrán aplicarse más allá del período especificado en el párrafo primero mientras no se hayan cumplido los compromisos pertinentes.
questions: ["Can the application extend beyond the period specified in the first paragraph?", "What condition must be met for the application to extend beyond the period specified in the first paragraph?"]
answers: ["Yes", "The relevant commitments have not been fulfilled"]

en: In response to progress made by the new Member State concerned in fulfilling its commitments, the Commission may adapt the measures as appropriate.
es: Atendiendo a los progresos realizados por el nuevo Estado miembro de que se trate en el cumplimiento de sus compromisos, la Comisión podrá adaptar las medidas en función de las circunstancias.
questions: ["On what basis may the Commission adapt the measures?", "What actions may the Commission take in response to progress made by the new Member State?", "When may the Commission adapt the measures in response to progress made by the new Member State?"]
answers: ["On the basis of progress made by the new Member State concerned in fulfilling its commitments", "Adapt the measures", "In response to progress made by the new Member State"]

en: The Commission shall inform the Council in good time before revoking the European regulations and decisions establishing the safeguard measures, and it shall take duly into account any observations of the Council in this respect.
es: La Comisión informará al Consejo con antelación suficiente antes de revocar los reglamentos o decisiones europeos que establezcan las medidas de salvaguardia y tendrá debidamente en cuenta cualquier observación del Consejo a este respecto.
questions: ["When shall the Commission inform the Council before revoking European regulations and decisions establishing safeguard measures?", "What shall the Commission take into account when revoking European regulations and decisions establishing safeguard measures?"]
answers: ["In good time", "Any observations of the Council"]

en: The measures shall be maintained no longer than strictly necessary and, in any case, shall be lifted when the shortcomings are remedied.
es: Las medidas no se mantendrán más de lo estrictamente necesario y, en todo caso, se suspenderán cuando se solucionen las deficiencias.
questions: ["For how long shall the measures be maintained?", "When shall the measures be lifted?"]
answers: ["No longer than strictly necessary", "When the shortcomings are remedied"]

en: They may however be applied beyond the period specified in the first paragraph as long as these shortcomings persist.
es: Sin embargo, podrán aplicarse más allá del período especificado en el primer párrafo mientras subsistan dichas deficiencias.
questions: ["Can the application extend beyond the period specified in the first paragraph?", "Under what condition can the application be extended beyond the period specified in the first paragraph?"]
answers: ["Yes", "As long as these shortcomings persist"]

en: In response to progress made by the new Member State concerned in rectifying the identified shortcomings, the Commission may adapt the measures as appropriate after consulting the Member States.
es: Atendiendo a los progresos realizados por el nuevo Estado miembro de que se trate en la rectificación de las deficiencias observadas, la Comisión podrá adaptar las medidas en función de las circunstancias tras consultar a los Estados miembros.
questions: ["Can the Commission adapt the measures in response to progress made by the new Member State?", "Does the Commission need to consult the Member States before adapting the measures?", "What conditions allow the Commission to adapt the measures?"]
answers: ["Yes", "No", "Progress made by the new Member State in rectifying the identified shortcomings"]

en: The transitional measures referred to in this Article may be adopted during a period of three years following the date of accession and their application shall be limited to that period.
es: Las medidas transitorias a que se refiere el presente artículo podrán adoptarse durante un periodo de tres años a partir de la fecha de adhesión, quedando su aplicación limitada a ese periodo.
questions: ["For how long may the transitional measures referred to in this Article be adopted?", "During what period shall the application of the transitional measures be limited?"]
answers: ["For a period of three years following the date of accession", "During the period of three years following the date of accession"]

en: A European law of the Council may extend this period.
es: Una ley europea del Consejo podrá prolongar dicho período.
questions: ["Can a European law of the Council extend this period?"]
answers: ["Yes"]

en: These measures shall be taken during a period of three years following the date of accession and their application shall be limited to that period.
es: Podrán adoptarse tales medidas durante un período de tres años a partir de la fecha de adhesión, quedando su aplicación limitada a ese periodo.
questions: ["For how long shall these measures be taken after the date of accession?", "During what period shall the application of these measures be limited?"]
answers: ["For a period of three years", "During a period of three years"]

en: The European Parliament shall make such adaptations to its Rules of Procedure as are rendered necessary by accession.
es: El Parlamento Europeo efectuará en su Reglamento Interno las adaptaciones que resulten necesarias como consecuencia de la adhesión.
questions: ["What adaptations shall the European Parliament make to its Rules of Procedure?", "What factors render adaptations to the Rules of Procedure necessary?"]
answers: ["such adaptations as are rendered necessary by accession", "accession"]

en: The Council shall make such adaptations to its Rules of Procedure as are rendered necessary by accession.
es: El Consejo efectuará en su Reglamento Interno las adaptaciones que resulten necesarias como consecuencia de la adhesión.
questions: ["What adaptations shall the Council make to its Rules of Procedure?", "What factors render adaptations to the Council's Rules of Procedure necessary?"]
answers: ["such adaptations as are rendered necessary by accession", "accession"]

en: A national of each new Member State shall be appointed to the Commission as from the date of accession.
es: Se nombrará miembro de la Comisión a un nacional de cada nuevo Estado miembro a partir de la fecha de la adhesión.

answers: ["As from the date of accession", "One", "The country becomes a new Member State"]

en: The new Members of the Commission shall be appointed by the Council, by common accord with the President of the Commission, after consulting the European Parliament and in accordance with the criteria set out in Article I-26(4) of the Constitution.
es: Los nuevos miembros de la Comisión serán nombrados por el Consejo, de común acuerdo con el Presidente de la Comisión, previa consulta al Parlamento Europeo y con arreglo a los criterios establecidos en el apartado 4 del artículo I-26 de la Constitución.
questions: ["Who shall appoint the new Members of the Commission?", "What is the requirement for the appointment of new Members of the Commission?", "By what means shall the Council appoint the new Members of the Commission?", "What body must be consulted during the appointment of new Members of the Commission?", "What criteria shall be used for the appointment of new Members of the Commission?"]
answers: ["The Council", "By common accord with the President of the Commission, after consulting the European Parliament and in accordance with the criteria set out in Article I-26(4) of the Constitution", "By common accord with the President of the Commission", "The European Parliament", "The criteria set out in Article I-26(4) of the Constitution"]

en: The terms of office of the Members thus appointed shall expire at the same time as those of the Members in office at the time of accession.

en: The Court of Justice shall make such adaptations to its Rules of Procedure as are rendered necessary by accession.

en: A national of each new Member State shall be appointed to the Court of Auditors as from the date of accession for a term of office of six years.

en: The terms of office of the members thus appointed shall expire at the same time as those of the members in office at the time of accession.

en: The Economic and Social Committee shall be enlarged by the appointment of 27 members representing the various economic and social components of organised civil society in Bulgaria and Romania.

en: Adaptations to the rules of the Committees established by the Constitution and to their rules of procedure, necessitated by the accession, shall be made as soon as possible after accession.
es: Las adaptaciones de los estatutos y de los reglamentos internos de los Comités creados por la Constitución que resulten necesarias como consecuencia de la adhesión se efectuarán tan pronto como sea posible después de la adhesión.

answers: ["As soon as possible after accession"]

en: The terms of office of the newly appointed members shall expire at the same time as those of the members in office at the time of accession.
es: El mandato de los miembros así nombrados expirará al mismo tiempo que el de los miembros en funciones en el momento de la adhesión.
questions: ["When will the terms of office of the newly appointed members expire?", "When will the terms of office of the members in office at the time of accession expire?"]

questions: ["When was the protocol last amended?", "What is the decision number that last amended the protocol?", "When was the decision that amended the protocol published in the Official Journal?"]
answers: ["By Decision No 2/2003 of the EU/Romania Association Council of 25.9.2003", "Decision No 2/2003", "The decision was not published in the Official Journal"]

en: List referred to in Article 20 of the Protocol: transitional measures, Bulgaria
es: Lista contemplada en el artículo 20 del Protocolo: Medidas transitorias para Bulgaria
questions: ["What list is referred to in Article 20 of the Protocol regarding Bulgaria?"]
answers: ["transitional measures"]

en: The present Member States may continue to apply such measures until the end of the five year period following the date of accession.
es: Los Estados miembros actuales podrán seguir aplicando tales medidas hasta el final de un período de cinco años a partir de la fecha de adhesión.
questions: ["Until when may the present Member States continue to apply such measures?"]
answers: ["Until the end of the five year period following the date of accession"]

en: Bulgarian nationals admitted to the labour market of a present Member State following accession for an uninterrupted period of 12 months or longer shall also enjoy the same rights.
es: Los nacionales búlgaros admitidos en el mercado de trabajo de uno de los Estados miembros actuales después de la adhesión por un período ininterrumpido igual o superior a doce meses tendrán también los mismos derechos.
questions: ["What is the required period of uninterrupted admission for Bulgarian nationals to the labour market of a present Member State to enjoy the same rights?", "Which rights do Bulgarian nationals enjoy after being admitted to the labour market for an uninterrupted period of 12 months or longer?"]
answers: ["12 months or longer", "The same rights"]

en: The Bulgarian nationals mentioned in the second and third subparagraphs above shall cease to enjoy the rights contained in those subparagraphs if they voluntarily leave the labour market of the present Member State in question.
es: Los nacionales búlgaros a que se refieren los párrafos segundo y tercero anteriores perderán los derechos que se recogen en dichos párrafos en el caso de que abandonen voluntariamente el mercado de trabajo del Estado miembro en cuestión.
questions: ["Under what conditions shall Bulgarian nationals cease to enjoy the rights contained in the second and third subparagraphs?", "What action must Bulgarian nationals take to cease enjoying the rights in the second and third subparagraphs?"]
answers: ["If they voluntarily leave the labour market of the present Member State in question", "Voluntarily leave the labour market of the present Member State in question"]

en: Before the end of the two year period following the date of accession, the Council shall review the functioning of the transitional provisions laid down in paragraph 2, on the basis of a report from the Commission.
es: Antes de que termine el periodo de dos años desde la fecha de adhesión, el Consejo revisará el funcionamiento de las medidas transitorias establecidas en el punto 2, sobre la base de un informe de la Comisión.
questions: ["Before the end of the two-year period following the date of accession, what will the Council do regarding the functioning of the transitional provisions laid down in paragraph 2?", "On what basis will the Council review the functioning of the transitional provisions laid down in paragraph 2?"]
answers: ["The Council shall review the functioning of the transitional provisions laid down in paragraph 2", "On the basis of a report from the Commission"]

en: Upon the request of Bulgaria, one further review may be held.
es: A petición de Bulgaria, podrá llevarse a cabo una nueva revisión.
questions: ["Can Bulgaria request one further review?"]
answers: ["Yes"]

en: The procedure referred to in paragraph 3 shall apply and shall be completed within six months of receipt of the request from Bulgaria.
es: En tal caso, se aplicará el procedimiento a que se refiere el punto 3, que deberá concluir en un plazo de seis meses desde que se reciba la petición de Bulgaria.
questions: ["What procedure shall apply as referred to in paragraph 3?", "Within how long shall the procedure referred to in paragraph 3 be completed after receipt of the request from Bulgaria?"]
answers: ["The procedure referred to in paragraph 3", "Within six months"]

en: The Commission shall decide on the suspension and on the duration and scope thereof not later than two weeks after receiving such a request and shall notify the Council of such a decision.
es: La Comisión adoptará una decisión sobre la suspensión y, en su caso, sobre la duración y alcance de la misma en un plazo máximo de dos semanas a partir de la recepción de la solicitud y notificará dicha decisión al Consejo.
questions: ["When will the Commission decide on the suspension and its duration and scope?", "When will the Commission notify the Council of its decision on the suspension and its duration and scope?"]
answers: ["Not later than two weeks after receiving such a request", "Not later than two weeks after receiving such a request"]

en: Any Member State may, within two weeks from the date of the Commission's Decision, request the Council to annul or amend the Decision.
es: Durante las dos semanas siguientes a la fecha de la decisión de la Comisión, cualquier Estado miembro podrá solicitar al Consejo su anulación o modificación.
questions: ["Within how many weeks from the date of the Commission's Decision may a Member State request the Council to annul or amend the Decision?", "Which entity may request the Council to annul or amend the Commission's Decision?", "What action may a Member State take within two weeks of the Commission's Decision?"]
answers: ["Two weeks", "A Member State", "Request the Council to annul or amend the Decision"]

en: The Council shall act on such a request within two weeks, by qualified majority.
es: El Consejo se pronunciará sobre dicha solicitud, por mayoría cualificada, en un plazo de dos semanas.
questions: ["Within how many weeks shall the Council act on such a request?", "What voting method shall be used for the Council to act on such a request?"]
answers: ["Two weeks", "Qualified majority"]

en: A Member State referred to in the first subparagraph may, in urgent and exceptional cases, suspend the application of Articles 1 to 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68, followed by a reasoned ex-post notification to the Commission.
es: En casos excepcionales y urgentes, los Estados miembros a que se refiere el párrafo primero podrán suspender la aplicación de los artículos 1 a 6 del Reglamento (CEE) n.o 1612/68. Dicha suspensión deberá ir seguida de una notificación ex-post razonada a la Comisión.
questions: ["May a Member State suspend the application of Articles 1 to 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68?", "Under what conditions may a Member State suspend the application of Articles 1 to 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68?", "What must a Member State do after suspending the application of Articles 1 to 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68?"]
answers: ["Yes", "In urgent and exceptional cases", "A reasoned ex-post notification to the Commission"]

en: This does not apply to family members of a worker legally admitted to the labour market of that Member State for a period of less than 12 months;
es: Lo anterior no se aplicará a los miembros de la familia de un trabajador que haya sido admitido legalmente en el mercado de trabajo de tal Estado miembro por un período inferior a 12 meses;
questions: ["Does this provision apply to family members of a worker legally admitted to the labour market of that Member State for a period of less than 12 months?"]

en: These provisions shall be without prejudice to more favourable measures whether national or resulting from bilateral agreements.
es: Las presentes disposiciones se entenderán sin perjuicio de medidas más favorables, ya sean nacionales o derivadas de acuerdos bilaterales.
questions: ["Are there any more favourable measures that may apply, whether national or from bilateral agreements?"]
answers: ["Yes"]

en: If the application of Articles 1 to 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68 is suspended by any of the present Member States, Bulgaria may resort to the procedures laid down in paragraph 7 with respect to Romania.
es: En caso de que alguno de los Estados miembros actuales suspenda la aplicación de los artículos 1 a 6 del Reglamento (CEE) n.o 1612/68, Bulgaria podrá recurrir a los procedimientos establecidos en el punto 7 con respecto a Rumanía.
questions: ["If the application of Articles 1 to 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68 is suspended by any of the present Member States, can Bulgaria resort to the procedures laid down in paragraph 7 with respect to Romania?"]
answers: ["Yes"]

en: During any such period work permits issued by Bulgaria for monitoring purposes to nationals of Romania shall be issued automatically.
es: Durante dicho período, los permisos de trabajo concedidos por Bulgaria a efectos de control a nacionales rumanos se expedirán automáticamente.
questions: ["Will work permits issued by Bulgaria for monitoring purposes to nationals of Romania be issued automatically during any such period?"]
answers: ["Yes"]

en: Any present Member State applying national measures in accordance with paragraphs 2 to 5 and 7 to 9, may introduce, under national law, greater freedom of movement than that existing at the date of accession, including full labour market access.
es: Cualquiera de los Estados miembros actuales que aplique medidas nacionales de conformidad con los puntos 2 a 5 y 7 a 9 podrá estipular, en su Derecho interno, una mayor libertad de circulación que la existente en la fecha de adhesión, incluido el pleno acceso al mercado de trabajo.
questions: ["Can a present Member State introduce greater freedom of movement than that existing at the date of accession under national law?", "Can a present Member State introduce full labour market access under national law?", "Under what conditions may a present Member State introduce greater freedom of movement under national law?", "Under what conditions may a present Member State introduce full labour market access under national law?"]
answers: ["Yes", "Yes", "In accordance with paragraphs 2 to 5 and 7 to 9", "In accordance with paragraphs 2 to 5 and 7 to 9"]

en: From the third year following the date of accession, any present Member State applying national measures may at any time decide to apply Articles 1 to 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68 instead.
es: A partir del tercer año siguiente a la fecha de adhesión, cualquiera de los Estados miembros actuales que esté aplicando medidas nacionales podrá decidir en todo momento su sustitución por la aplicación de los artículos 1 a 6 del Reglamento (CEE) n.o 1612/68.
questions: ["From the third year following the date of accession, may a Member State decide to apply Articles 1 to 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68 instead?", "Can a Member State apply Articles 1 to 6 of Regulation (EEC) No 1612/68 instead at any time after the third year following accession?"]
answers: ["Yes", "Yes"]

en: The Commission shall be informed of any such decision.
es: En tal caso, se informará a la Comisión de dicha decisión.
questions: ["Who shall be informed of any such decision?"]
answers: ["The Commission"]

es: La lista de los sectores de servicios a los que puede aplicarse esta excepción es la siguiente:
questions: ["What service sectors may be covered by this derogation?"]
answers: ["The list of service sectors which may be covered by this derogation is as follows"]

en: Activities listed in the Annex to Directive 96/71/EC
es: Actividades enumeradas en el anexo de la Directiva 96/71/CE
questions: ["What activities are listed in the Annex to Directive 96/71/EC?"]
answers: ["Activities listed in the Annex to Directive 96/71/EC"]

en: Manufacture of metal structures and parts of structures
es: Fabricación de estructuras metálicas y sus partes
questions: ["What types of metal structures and parts are manufactured?"]
answers: ["Metal structures and parts of structures"]

en: To the extent that Germany or Austria derogate from the first paragraph of Article III-144 of the Constitution in accordance with the preceding subparagraphs, Bulgaria may, after notifying the Commission, take equivalent measures.
es: En la medida en que, de conformidad con los párrafos anteriores, Alemania o Austria establezcan excepciones al párrafo primero del artículo III-144 de la Constitución, Bulgaria podrá adoptar medidas equivalentes, previa notificación a la Comisión.
questions: ["Under what conditions may Bulgaria take equivalent measures?", "When can Bulgaria take equivalent measures after notifying the Commission?", "What constitutes a derogation by Germany or Austria from the first paragraph of Article III-144 of the Constitution?", "What does the preceding subparagraphs specify regarding derogation?"]
answers: ["When Germany or Austria derogate from the first paragraph of Article III-144 of the Constitution in accordance with the preceding subparagraphs", "After notifying the Commission", "A derogation by Germany or Austria from the first paragraph of Article III-144 of the Constitution in accordance with the preceding subparagraphs", "The conditions under which Germany or Austria may derogate from the first paragraph of Article III-144 of the Constitution"]

en: Furthermore, in application of the principle of Community preference, migrant workers from third countries resident and working in Bulgaria shall not be treated more favourably than nationals of Bulgaria.
es: Por otra parte, en aplicación del principio de preferencia comunitaria, los trabajadores migrantes de terceros países que residan y trabajen en Bulgaria no recibirán un trato más favorable que el que sea de aplicación a los nacionales búlgaros.
questions: ["How does the principle of Community preference affect the treatment of migrant workers from third countries in Bulgaria?", "Are migrant workers from third countries resident and working in Bulgaria treated more favourably than nationals of Bulgaria under the principle of Community preference?"]
answers: ["Migrant workers from third countries resident and working in Bulgaria shall not be treated more favourably than nationals of Bulgaria", "No"]

en: By way of derogation from Article 4(1) of Directive 97/9/EC, the minimum level of compensation shall not apply in Bulgaria until 31 December 2009.
es: No obstante lo dispuesto en el apartado 1 del artículo 4 de la Directiva 97/9/CE, el nivel mínimo de indemnización no se aplicará en Bulgaria hasta el 31 de diciembre de 2009.
questions: ["Until what date shall the minimum level of compensation not apply in Bulgaria?", "Does Article 4(1) of Directive 97/9/EC apply in Bulgaria regarding the minimum level of compensation?"]
answers: ["31 December 2009", "No"]

en: A general review of these transitional measures shall be held in the third year following the date of accession.
es: En el tercer año posterior a la fecha de adhesión se procederá a una evaluación global de estas medidas transitorias.
questions: ["When shall a general review of these transitional measures be held?"]
answers: ["In the third year following the date of accession"]

en: To this effect, the Commission shall submit a report to the Council.
es: A tal efecto, la Comisión presentará un informe al Consejo.
questions: ["What shall the Commission submit to the Council?"]
answers: ["a report"]

en: The Council may, acting unanimously on a proposal from the Commission, decide to shorten or terminate the transitional period indicated in the first subparagraph.
es: Éste, por unanimidad y a propuesta de la Comisión, podrá decidir que se reduzca o ponga término al periodo transitorio indicado en el párrafo primero.
questions: ["Can the Council decide to shorten or terminate the transitional period?", "On what basis can the Council decide to shorten or terminate the transitional period?", "Does the Council have the authority to shorten or terminate the transitional period?", "What action can the Council take regarding the transitional period when acting unanimously on a Commission proposal?"]
answers: ["Yes", "On a proposal from the Commission", "Yes", "Decide to shorten or terminate the transitional period"]

en: Drinking milk which does not comply with the requirements relating to fat content may be marketed only in Bulgaria or exported to third countries.
es: La leche de consumo que no cumpla las exigencias relativas al contenido en materia grasa únicamente podrá comercializarse en Bulgaria o exportarse a un tercer país.
questions: ["Under what conditions may milk be marketed in Bulgaria?", "Under what conditions may milk be exported to third countries?"]
answers: ["Drinking milk which does not comply with the requirements relating to fat content", "Drinking milk which does not comply with the requirements relating to fat content"]

en: These products must bear a different identification mark to that provided for in Article 5 of Regulation (EC) No 853/2004.
es: Dichos productos llevarán una marca de identificación distinta de la que se establece en el artículo 5 del Reglamento (CE) n.o 853/2004.
questions: ["What identification mark must these products bear?", "What identification mark is provided for in Article 5 of Regulation (EC) No 853/2004?"]
answers: ["A different identification mark", "The identification mark provided for in Article 5 of Regulation (EC) No 853/2004"]

en: The establishments listed in Chapter II of the Appendix to this Annex may until 31 December 2009 process EU compliant and EU non-compliant milk on separate production lines.
es: Los establecimientos enumerados en el Capítulo II del Apéndice del presente Anexo podrán transformar hasta el 31 de diciembre de 2009 leche conforme con los requisitos de la UE y leche no conforme con dichos requisitos, siempre que lo hagan en líneas de producción separadas.
questions: ["Can establishments listed in Chapter II of the Appendix to this Annex process EU compliant and EU non-compliant milk on separate production lines until 31 December 2009?"]
answers: ["Yes"]

en: In this context EU non-compliant milk is understood as the milk referred to in paragraph (a).
es: En este contexto se entenderá por leche no conforme con los requisitos de la UE la leche a que se refiere la letra a).
questions: ["What is meant by EU non-compliant milk in this context?", "Which milk is referred to in paragraph (a) as EU non-compliant milk?"]
answers: ["The milk referred to in paragraph (a)", "The milk referred to in paragraph (a)"]

en: expose all raw milk to heat treatment at a temperature of minimum 71,7oC for 15 seconds, and
es: someter toda la leche cruda a tratamiento térmico a una temperatura mínima de 71,7 oC durante 15 segundos, y
questions: ["What is the minimum temperature required to heat treat raw milk?", "How long should raw milk be heated at the minimum temperature of 71.7°C?"]

en: take all appropriate measures to ensure that the identification marks are not used fraudulently.
es: adoptar todas las medidas oportunas para asegurarse de que no se utilicen de manera fraudulenta las marcas de identificación.
questions: ["What measures should be taken to prevent the fraudulent use of identification marks?"]
answers: ["Take all appropriate measures"]

en: ensure that the operator or manager of each establishment concerned takes all necessary measures to allow for the proper observance of in-house procedures for the separation of milk;
es: velarán por que el empresario o gestor de cada uno de los establecimientos afectados tome todas las medidas necesarias para permitir el cumplimiento adecuado de los procedimientos internos de separación de la leche,
questions: ["What measures should the operator or manager of each establishment take to ensure the proper observance of in-house procedures for the separation of milk?"]
answers: ["All necessary measures"]

en: conduct tests and unannounced controls relating to the observance of milk separation; and
es: efectuarán pruebas e inspecciones sin previo aviso para comprobar la observancia de la separación de la leche, y
questions: ["What types of tests and controls are conducted regarding milk separation?", "Are unannounced controls performed to ensure compliance with milk separation standards?"]
answers: ["conduct tests and unannounced controls", "Yes"]

en: The milk and/or milk-based products originating from separate production lines processing EU non-compliant raw milk in EU-approved milk processing establishments may only be placed on the market subject to the conditions laid down in paragraph (b).
es: La leche y los productos lácteos procedentes de líneas de producción separadas que transformen leche cruda no conforme con los requisitos de la UE en establecimientos de transformación de leche aprobados por la UE sólo podrán comercializarse en las condiciones establecidas en la letra b).
questions: ["Under what conditions may milk and/or milk-based products originating from separate production lines processing EU non-compliant raw milk in EU-approved milk processing establishments be placed on the market?"]
answers: ["subject to the conditions laid down in paragraph (b)"]

en: Bulgaria shall ensure gradual compliance with the requirements referred to in paragraph (a) and shall submit annual reports to the Commission on progress made in upgrading dairy farms and the milk collection system.
es: Bulgaria garantizará el cumplimiento gradual de los requisitos a que se refiere la letra a) y presentará a la Comisión informes anuales sobre los progresos realizados en la mejora de las explotaciones lecheras y del sistema de recogida de la leche.
questions: ["What shall Bulgaria ensure regarding compliance with the requirements referred to in paragraph (a)?", "What reports shall Bulgaria submit annually to the Commission?", "What aspects of dairy farms and the milk collection system shall Bulgaria report progress on?"]
answers: ["Gradual compliance", "Annual reports on progress made in upgrading dairy farms and the milk collection system", "Upgrading dairy farms and the milk collection system"]

en: Bulgaria shall ensure that these requirements are fully complied with by 31 December 2009.
es: Bulgaria garantizará que esos requisitos se cumplan plenamente el 31 de diciembre de 2009.
questions: ["By what date shall Bulgaria ensure that these requirements are fully complied with?"]
answers: ["31 December 2009"]

en: Detailed implementation rules to ensure the smooth operation of the above transitional regime may be adopted in accordance with the procedure referred to in Article 58 of Regulation (EC) No 178/2002.
es: Se adoptarán, de conformidad con el procedimiento establecido en el artículo 58 del Reglamento (CE) n.o 178/2002, normas de desarrollo detalladas que garanticen el buen funcionamiento del régimen transitorio indicado.
questions: ["What are the detailed implementation rules for ensuring the smooth operation of the transitional regime?", "What procedure is referred to in Article 58 of Regulation (EC) No 178/2002 for adopting the implementation rules?"]
answers: ["Rules to ensure the smooth operation of the above transitional regime", "The procedure referred to in Article 58 of Regulation (EC) No 178/2002"]

en: Before the end of the third year following the date of accession, Member States shall notify the Commission whether they will prolong this period for a maximum of two years or whether they will fully apply Article 1 of the Regulation henceforth.
es: Antes de que transcurran tres años desde la fecha de adhesión, los Estados miembros notificarán a la Comisión si van a prolongar este plazo, por un máximo de dos años, o si en lo sucesivo aplicarán plenamente el artículo 1 del Reglamento. De no efectuarse la notificación, será de aplicación el artículo 1 del Reglamento. Únicamente los transportistas establecidos en los Estados miembros en los que se aplique el artículo 1 del Reglamento podrán efectuar transportes nacionales de mercancías por carretera en los Estados miembros en los que también se aplique dicho artículo 1.
questions: ["Will Member States notify the Commission before the end of the third year following the date of accession?", "Will Member States choose to prolong the period for a maximum of two years or fully apply Article 1 of the Regulation henceforth?"]
answers: ["Yes", "Yes"]

en: On the basis of this information, the Member State may request the Commission to suspend, in whole or in part, the application of Article 1 of the Regulation, in order to restore to normal the situation.
es: Basándose en esta información, el Estado miembro podrá solicitar a la Comisión que suspenda, total o parcialmente, la aplicación del artículo 1 del Reglamento, a fin de que la situación vuelva a la normalidad.
questions: ["On what basis may the Member State request the Commission to suspend the application of Article 1 of the Regulation?", "Can the Member State request the Commission to suspend the application of Article 1 of the Regulation in whole or in part?", "What is the purpose of requesting the Commission to suspend the application of Article 1 of the Regulation?"]
answers: ["On the basis of this information", "Yes", "To restore to normal the situation"]

en: The Commission shall examine the situation on the basis of data provided by the Member State concerned and shall decide within one month of receipt of the request on the need for the adoption of safeguard measures.
es: La Comisión examinará la situación basándose en los datos que facilite el Estado miembro de que se trate y, en el plazo de un mes a partir de la recepción de la solicitud, decidirá si es necesario adoptar medidas de salvaguardia.
questions: ["On what basis shall the Commission examine the situation?", "Within how long shall the Commission decide on the need for the adoption of safeguard measures after receiving the request?"]
answers: ["On the basis of data provided by the Member State concerned", "Within one month"]

en: The procedure laid down in the second, third and fourth subparagraphs of paragraph 3, as well as paragraphs 4, 5 and 6 of Article 7 of the Regulation shall apply.
es: Será de aplicación el procedimiento expuesto en los párrafos segundo, tercero y cuarto del apartado 3 y en los apartados 4, 5 y 6 del artículo 7 del Reglamento.
questions: ["Which subparagraphs of paragraph 3 shall the procedure apply to?", "Which paragraphs of Article 7 shall the procedure apply to?"]
answers: ["the second, third and fourth subparagraphs of paragraph 3", "paragraphs 4, 5 and 6 of Article 7"]

en: A Member State referred to in the first subparagraph above may, in urgent and exceptional cases, suspend the application of Article 1 of the Regulation, followed by a reasoned ex-post notification to the Commission.
es: En casos excepcionales y urgentes, cualquier Estado miembro de los contemplados en el párrafo primero podrá suspender la aplicación del artículo 1 del Reglamento, suspensión que deberá ir seguida de una notificación motivada a la Comisión.
questions: ["May a Member State suspend the application of Article 1 of the Regulation under what conditions?", "What must a Member State do after suspending the application of Article 1 of the Regulation?"]
answers: ["Under urgent and exceptional cases", "A reasoned ex-post notification to the Commission"]

en: This may include the possibility of full liberalisation.
es: También podrá contemplarse la posibilidad de una liberalización total de los servicios.
questions: ["May this include the possibility of full liberalisation?"]
answers: ["Yes"]

en: The effect of the application of paragraphs (a) to (c) shall not lead to more restrictive access to national road haulage services than that prevailing on the date of signature of the Treaty of Accession.
es: La aplicación de las letras a) a c) no deberá dar lugar a un acceso al transporte nacional de mercancías por carretera más restrictivo que el imperante en el momento de la firma del Tratado de Adhesión.
questions: ["Will the application of paragraphs (a) to (c) result in more restrictive access to national road haulage services than that prevailing on the date of signature of the Treaty of Accession?", "Does the application of paragraphs (a) to (c) lead to more restrictive access to national road haulage services than the access level on the date of signature of the Treaty of Accession?"]

en: Until 31 December 2010, Article 3(3)(c) of Directive 96/26/EC shall not apply in Bulgaria to transport undertakings engaged exclusively in domestic road haulage and passenger transport operations.
es: La letra c) del apartado 3 del artículo 3 de la Directiva 96/26/CE no se aplicará en Bulgaria hasta el 31 de diciembre de 2010 a las empresas de transportes dedicadas exclusivamente al transporte nacional de mercancías y de viajeros por carretera.
questions: ["Until what date shall Article 3(3)(c) of Directive 96/26/EC not apply in Bulgaria to transport undertakings engaged exclusively in domestic road haulage and passenger transport operations?"]
answers: ["31 December 2010"]

en: by 1 January 2008, the undertaking must have available capital and reserves of at least EUR 6750 for the first and at least EUR 3750 for each additional vehicle;
es: para el 1 de enero de 2008, cada empresa deberá disponer de un capital y de reservas cuyo valor sea como mínimo de 6750 EUR para el primer vehículo y como mínimo de 3750 EUR por cada vehículo adicional;
questions: ["By 1 January 2008, what must the undertaking have available in capital and reserves for the first vehicle?", "By 1 January 2008, what must the undertaking have available in capital and reserves for each additional vehicle?"]

en: by 1 January 2009, the undertaking must have available capital and reserves of at least EUR 7650 for the first and at least EUR 4250 for each additional vehicle;
es: para el 1 de enero de 2009, cada empresa deberá disponer de un capital y de reservas cuyo valor sea como mínimo de 7650 EUR para el primer vehículo y como mínimo de 4250 EUR por cada vehículo adicional;
questions: ["By 1 January 2009, what must the undertaking have available in capital and reserves for the first vehicle?", "By 1 January 2009, what must the undertaking have available in capital and reserves for each additional vehicle?"]

en: by 1 January 2010, the undertaking must have available capital and reserves of at least EUR 8550 for the first and at least EUR 4750 for each additional vehicle.
es: para el 1 de enero de 2010, cada empresa deberá disponer de un capital y de reservas cuyo valor sea como mínimo de 8550 EUR para el primer vehículo y como mínimo de 4750 EUR por cada vehículo adicional.
questions: ["By 1 January 2010, what must the undertaking have available in capital and reserves for the first vehicle?", "By 1 January 2010, what must the undertaking have available in capital and reserves for each additional vehicle?"]
answers: ["at least EUR 8550", "at least EUR 4750"]

en: Any infrastructure investments involving the use of funds from the Community budget shall ensure that the arteries are constructed or upgraded to a load bearing capacity of 11,5 tonnes per axle.
es: Toda inversión en infraestructura que utilice fondos procedentes del presupuesto comunitario garantizará que las arterias se construyan o se acondicionen hasta lograr una capacidad de soporte de peso de 11,5 toneladas por eje.
questions: ["What must be ensured regarding infrastructure investments using Community budget funds?", "What load bearing capacity must the arteries have when constructed or upgraded using Community budget funds?"]
answers: ["That the arteries are constructed or upgraded to a load bearing capacity of 11,5 tonnes per axle", "11,5 tonnes per axle"]

en: For the purpose of loading and unloading, where technically possible, the use of non-upgraded parts of the secondary road network shall be allowed during the entire transitional period.
es: A efectos de la carga y descarga, el uso de tramos no acondicionados de la red de carreteras secundarias estará autorizado, de ser técnicamente posible, durante todo el período transitorio.
questions: ["Where shall the use of non-upgraded parts of the secondary road network be allowed during the entire transitional period?", "Under what conditions shall the use of non-upgraded parts of the secondary road network be allowed during the entire transitional period?"]
answers: ["Where technically possible", "Where technically possible"]

en: By 1 January 2011, Bulgaria shall submit an updated plan to the Commission, including an investment plan, for the gradual alignment of the remaining non-compliant plants with clearly defined stages for the application of the acquis.
es: Para el 1 de enero de 2011 Bulgaria presentará a la Comisión un plan actualizado que incluya un plan de inversiones, para la adecuación gradual de las restantes instalaciones que no cumplen los requisitos, con fases claramente definidas para la aplicación del acervo.
